tooltip: Form Title: Clearly states the purpose of the form.
Form Description: Provides context and instructions.
Issue Type: Categorizes the problem for faster routing.
Detailed Description: Provide as much detail as possible here.
Nova's Note: A helpful, context-aware tip from me to you!
Game Select: Specify which game your issue is related to.
Preferred Email: Where you'll receive updates about your ticket.
Attachment: Upload screenshots or videos to provide more context.
CAPTCHA: A quick check to ensure you're human.
Submit Button: Sends your completed form to the support team.
